license.title: Domain Configuration
license.subtitle: Configure your custom domain settings for the Zelf ecosystem

basic_information.title: Basic Information
basic_information.domain_pattern_error: Domain must contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens

features.title: Features
features.zns_disabled_description: Tag validation rules, payment settings, and pricing configuration are only available when Zelf Name Service (ZNS) is enabled.
features.zns_disabled_enable: Enable ZNS above to configure tag-related settings.

validation_rules.title: Validation Rules
validation_rules.content_filter_description: Automatically block inappropriate words like "dick", "vagina", etc.

payment_settings.title: Payment Settings
payment_settings.no_items: No whitelist items yet. Click "Add Item" to get started.

pricing_table.title: Pricing Table
pricing_table.description: Configure pricing for different tag lengths and subscription durations. Prices are in cents (e.g., 240 = $2.40).
pricing_table.pricing_info_2: • The "6-15" row applies to tag names with 6-15 characters
pricing_table.pricing_info_3: • Individual length rows (16-27) override the range pricing
pricing_table.pricing_info_4: • Changes are automatically saved when you update the form

limits.title: Limits
limits.info_description: Domain limits are automatically managed based on your subscription plan.
limits.info_subscription: To modify limits, please upgrade or change your subscription plan in the Plan & Billing section.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Monitor tag domain creation, subscriptions and activity metrics

tagDomainsOverview.title: Tag Domains Overview
tagDomainsOverview.subtitle: Number of tag domains created (free and premium)

paidTags.title: Paid Tags
paidTags.subtitle: Number of premium tag domains created

activeTags.title: Active Tags
activeTags.subtitle: Number of currently active tag domains

allTagsVsPaidTags.title: All Tags vs. Paid Tags
allTagsVsPaidTags.subtitle: Comparison between total and paid tag domains

conversionRate.title: Conversion Rate
conversionRate.description: Conversion rate shows the percentage of total tag registrations that convert to paid/premium tags. Higher is better.

premiumAdoption.title: Premium Adoption
premiumAdoption.description: Premium Adoption shows the percentage of users who upgrade to paid tag features. Higher indicates better monetization.

revenuePotential.title: Revenue Potential
revenuePotential.description: Revenue Potential shows the projected conversion rate based on current trends and user behavior patterns.

zelfUsers.title: Zelf Users
zelfUsers.subtitle: Demographic properties of Zelf platform users

tagLeaseLengths.title: Tag Lease Lengths
tagLeaseLengths.subtitle: Distribution of tag domain lease durations

domainLength.title: Domain Length
domainLength.subtitle: Distribution of tag domain character lengths

information.name_minlength: Name must be at least 2 characters

actions.invalid_settings: Invalid theme settings. Please check all color values.

payment.title: PURCHASE A NEW TAG NAME
payment.greatNews: Great news, this tag name is available!
payment.isAvailable: is available and can be claimed right now in our app or extension!
payment.step1Title: Login in Zelf from our extension in your browser or download the mobile app.
payment.step2Title: Search the tag that you want to register with the desired domain.
payment.step3Title: Complete all the security steps and the biometric authentication.
payment.step4Title: Finally, comeback to this page and finalize the domain purchase.

checkout.enjoyBenefits: Enjoy the benefits of ZNS — your face is your key.
checkout.keepReceipt: Would you like to keep a receipt of your payment?

tags.title: Tags Management
tags.subtitle: Manage your blockchain tags and QR codes

licenseWarning.title: License Not Configured
licenseWarning.message: Please configure your license in the Settings section to view and manage your tags.
